name: ArkStart
description: What is the project about? ArkStart, the first BRC-20 IDO project on BisoSwap. A groundbreaking staking function has been introduced on the BRC-20 protocol. This innovative feature is based on the ve(3,3) model, aims to provide users with opportunities for returns beyond transactions, ensuring safety, efficiency, and decentralization.
